languages.text: "Противясь законной власти, твой поганый Немезит попирает Кредо. И каждый прославляющий его — преступник".

traits.locale_text: "Красивым словам не скрыть гнусную суть Немезита: противясь законной власти, он попирает Кредо. И каждый прославляющий его — совершает преступление против Императора".

languages.text: "By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."
languages.original_text: "Противясь законной власти, твой поганый Немезит попирает Кредо. И каждый прославляющий его — преступник".

traits.locale_text: "By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."
"By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."
"By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."
"By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."
"By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."
"By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."

languages.text: «Al oponerse a la autoridad legítima, su vil Nemesitio deshonra el Credo. Todo el que le alabe será considerado un criminal».
languages.original_text: "By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."

traits.locale_text: «Al oponerse a la autoridad legítima, su vil Nemesitio deshonra el Credo. Todo el que le alabe será considerado un criminal».

languages.text: 「正当な権威に反対することで、あなたの下劣なネメサイトは信条を踏みにじる。彼を賛美する者は皆、犯罪者だ」
languages.original_text: "By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."

traits.locale_text: 「正当な権威に反対することで、あなたの下劣なネメサイトは信条を踏みにじる。彼を賛美する者は皆、犯罪者だ」

languages.text: “邪恶的涅墨斯特反对帝国的合法统治者，践踏了帝国的信条。所有支持涅墨斯特的人都是罪人。”
languages.original_text: "By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."

traits.locale_text: “邪恶的涅墨斯特反对帝国的合法统治者，践踏了帝国的信条。所有支持涅墨斯特的人都是罪人。”

languages.text: "Durch seinen Widerstand gegen die legitime Autorität trampelt Euer verdammter Nemesit auf dem Glauben herum. Und alle, die ihn glorifizieren, sind kriminell."
languages.original_text: "By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."

traits.locale_text: "Durch seinen Widerstand gegen die legitime Autorität trampelt Euer verdammter Nemesit auf dem Glauben herum. Und alle, die ihn glorifizieren, sind kriminell."

languages.text: « En s'opposant à l'autorité légitime, votre Némésite foule aux pieds le Crédo. Tous ceux qui le glorifient sont des criminels. »
languages.original_text: "By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."

traits.locale_text: « En s'opposant à l'autorité légitime, votre Némésite foule aux pieds le Crédo. Tous ceux qui le glorifient sont des criminels. »

languages.text: "Menfur Nemezit, meşru otoriteye karşı gelerek İtikat'ı ayaklar altına alıyor. Nemezit'i göklere yükselten herkes de suçludur."
languages.original_text: "By opposing legitimate authority, your vile Nemesite tramples on the Creed. And everyone who glorifies him is a criminal."
